characterList: 震振魄槐魅瑰魂愧魁醜壟寵龐攏聾籠插毀

characters.story: "JUN!" it commands sharply - to quake, tremble in an earthquake!
"JUN!" he commands sharply - to vibrate, shake - calm down and rest!
"PWOH!" it commands sharply - vigor, spirit, and soul that's sucked!
"HWAI?" the tree and ghost question curiously - scholar tree, locust wood?
"MAY!" the ghost commands sharply though not yet - to enchant, charm with special allure!
"GWAY!" the jewel and ghost sing cheerfully - marvelous, magnificent, and splendid!
"HWUN?" the ghost questions curiously - the soul, spirit, and essence?
"KWAY!" the heart commands sharply - ashamed, guilty, and embarrassed!
"KWAY?" the ghost and big dipper question curiously - a leader, chief, and champion?
This character represents ugly, whispering "Chǒu!" softly - a vivid image to remember!
The dragon and land bend down drooping - raised path between fields, ridge, and mound.
This character represents dote on, whispering "Chǒng!" softly!
"PAHNG?" the cave and dragon question curiously - huge, enormous, and vast?
The fingers bend down drooping - to draw near, gather the spirit in soil.
"LUNG?" the ear questions curiously - deaf, hearing impaired like Fengxia?
"LUNG?" the bamboo questions curiously - a cage, basket for chicken coop?
"CHAH!" the fingers sing cheerfully - to insert, stick, and interfere in battle!
The stone stands for ruin, whispering "Huǐ!" softly - a vivid image to remember!
